page.title: 11FARM MANAGER AT SCHOOL
page.content: At 6-30am. Dave Randall, farm manager at Abbotsholme school, starts his day.He lives in Marston Montgomery, a small village 2 miles from Abbotsholme. He travels to work by car.First he checks the stock,and then has breakfast at 7-30am. in school, before he feeds the cattle.He has his lunch between 12 and 1-00pm.and then starts the busier part of his day. This involves more physically demanding work until 5-00pm. when he goes home to his wife. He has a pet dog. Dave enjoys farming very much and his favourite animals to work with are the cows and his favourite job is hay-making. He has been farming for 22 years even though farming is not his familys tradition. He would like his own farm but is very happy at Abbotsholme.
